v t e Cryptographic hash functions and message authentication codes

List Comparison Known attacks

Common functions
MD5 (compromised) SHA-1 (compromised) SHA-2 SHA-3 BLAKE2

SHA-3 finalists , URL: /wiki/NIST_hash_function_competition

BLAKE Grøstl JH Skein Keccak (winner)

Other functions
BLAKE3 CubeHash ECOH FSB GOST HAS-160 HAVAL Kupyna LSH MASH-1 MASH-2 MD2 MD4 MD6 MDC-2 N-hash RIPEMD RadioGatún SM3 SWIFFT Snefru Streebog Tiger VSH Whirlpool

key stretching , URL: /wiki/Key_stretching

Argon2 Balloon bcrypt Catena crypt LM hash Lyra2 Makwa PBKDF2 scrypt yescrypt

key derivation functions , URL: /wiki/Key_derivation_function

HKDF KDF1/KDF2

MAC functions , URL: /wiki/Message_authentication_code

CBC-MAC DAA GMAC HMAC NMAC OMAC/CMAC PMAC Poly1305 SipHash UMAC VMAC

Authenticated encryption , URL: /wiki/Authenticated_encryption

CCM ChaCha20-Poly1305 CWC EAX GCM IAPM OCB

Attacks
Collision attack Preimage attack Birthday attack Brute-force attack Rainbow table Side-channel attack Length extension attack

Design
Avalanche effect Hash collision Merkle–Damgård construction Sponge function HAIFA construction

Standardization
CRYPTREC NESSIE NIST hash function competition

Utilization
Hash-based cryptography Merkle tree Message authentication Proof of work Salt Pepper
